scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.deploy: eb use udagram-api --profile default && eb deploy --profile default && eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET AWS_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_PORT=$POSTGRES_PORT POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME --profile default
